alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 4:46AM PST until December 11 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington and Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington
